question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements about Pt. Jawahar Lal Nehru?
  1. He was a co-founder of All-India Independence League
  2. He had served as president of All India States Peoples Conference
  3. He had served as secretary of Swaraj Party
  4. He joined as leader of Congress Socialist Party
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: All-India Independence League was jointly founded by Jawahar Lal Nehru, Subhash Chandra Bose, Jayprakash Narayan and Naboodaripad. Jawaharlal Nehru became the President of the All India States’ People’s Conference during 1930s. These two statements are correct. Motilal and not Jawahar lal was secretary of Swaraj Party. Nehru never joined Congress Socialist Party.
